plugin_description.en: Processes planet donations to and payments from the server.
plugin_description.de: Wickelt das Spenden von Planets an den Server und Auszahlungen vom Server ab.

slash_topdons_description.de: Zeigt die Top 100 der höchsten Spender an

message_thanks_all.en: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}$z$s{#donate} received a donation of {#highlite}{2}{#donate} planets from {#highlite}{3}$z$s{#donate}. Thank You!
message_thanks_all.de: {#server}» {#highlite}{1}$z$s{#donate} erhielt eine Spende von {#highlite}{2}{#donate} Planets von {#highlite}{3}$z$s{#donate}. Dankeschön!

message_thanks_you.en: {#server}» {#donate}You made a donation of {#highlite}{1}{#donate} planets. Thank You!

message_donate_help.en: {#server}» {#error}Use {#highlite}$i /donate <number>{#error} to donate planets to the server
message_donate_help.de: {#server}» {#error}Verwende den Befehl {#highlite}$i /donate <number>{#error} um Planets an den Server zu spenden

message_pay_server.de: {#server}» {#error}Der Server kann nicht an sich selbst auszahlen!

message_pay_confirm.en: {#server}» {#donate}Payment of {#highlite}{1}{#donate} planets to {#highlite}{2}{#donate} confirmed! Remaining planets: {#highlite}{3}
message_pay_confirm.de: {#server}» {#donate}Auszahlung von {#highlite}{1}{#donate} Planets an {#highlite}{2}{#donate} bestätigt! Verbleibende Planets: {#highlite}{3}

message_pay_help.en: {#server}» {#error}Use {#highlite}$i /admin pay <login> $m<number>{#error} to send server planets to a login
message_pay_help.de: {#server}» {#error}Verwende den Befehl {#highlite}$i /admin pay <login> $m<number>{#error} um Planets vom Server an einen Login zu schicken

message_confirmation.en: Would you like to pay now?
